alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 1:20AM MDT until June 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Moderate Flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 5.9 feet this morning. It will then rise above flood stage this evening to 7.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will fall below flood stage early Saturday morning to 6.5 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then rise to 6.6 feet Monday evening. It will fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.9 feet on 07/20/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 130 PM MDT.
